descriptionHtml:
Attack Pattern Information

ItemValue
Pattern IDXSS_REFL_012
Nameonclick event handler injection
CategoryXSS
Subcategoryreflected_xss
SeverityHIGH

Attack Details

  • Payload: <div onclick=alert(1)>click</div>
  • Encoded: %3Cdiv%20onclick%3Dalert(1)%3Eclick%3C%2Fdiv%3E
  • Expected Detection: Yes

Test Execution Results

  • Status: PASSED
  • Detection Count: 1 / 1
  • Latency: ~41000ms
  • Timestamp: 05:07:40.000 UTC

Detection Evidence
